descriptionSet.description: The Urdu text reads: Mohtarma aapa sahiba! Aadab arz hai. Aap se koson dur rah kar bhi aap ki inayaten aur shafqaten mere liye qalbi sukun ka ba'is bani hui hain. Aaj Eid ki mubarakbad pesh karte hue multamis hun ki apni chhoti bahan ko hamesha dua-e-khair me yaad farmati rahen. Dua'on ki talib...

inscription.text: Eastern.A.P. BombayZO. Eastern Commercial Agency Bay.3 Eid Greeting ECA No. 9

titleSet.title: Back of an Eid card, published by Eastern Commercial Agency, Bhindi Bazar, Bombay

hra:item.hra:value: text-en: Eastern.A.P. BombayZO. Eastern Commercial Agency Bay.3 Eid Greeting ECA No. 9

description-en: The Urdu text reads: Mohtarma aapa sahiba! Aadab arz hai. Aap se koson dur rah kar bhi aap ki inayaten aur shafqaten mere liye qalbi sukun ka ba'is bani hui hain. Aaj Eid ki mubarakbad pesh karte hue multamis hun ki apni chhoti bahan ko hamesha dua-e-khair me yaad farmati rahen. Dua'on ki talib... (gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: The printed message starts with a salutation of a young girl to her elder sister: Muhtarma aapa sahebaâ€¦ (Dear respected sister, my salutations. Despite the distance between us, your favours and love still provide tranquillity to my heart. While extending the Eid greetings to you, I request you to remember me forever in your prayers). (Yousuf Saeed)(gs)
explanatory comments/crosstagging: The printed message on the card is also a heartfelt salutation and greeting of a young girl to her elder sister stationed in a faraway location. (Yousuf Saeed)(gs)

related literature: Mathur, Saloni, "Wanted Native Views: Collecting colonial postcards of India," in Antionette Burton (ed.) Gender, Sexuality and Colonial Modernities, New York: Routledge, 1999, 95-115. (gs)
related literature: Patterson, Steven, Postcards from the Raj, Patterns of Prejudice, Volume 40, Number 2, Routledge, May 2006, 142-158; also see Saloni Mathur, 1999. (gs)
related hyperlink: Saeed, Yousuf 2011. "Eid Mubarak: Cross-cultural Image Exchange in Muslim South Asia." http://www.tasveergharindia.net/cmsdesk/essay/117/index_1.html last accessed 2011-04-08 (gs)
